title: Dario Franchitti
summary: George Dario Marino Franchitti,[2] MBE (born 19 May 1973) is a Scottish former racing driver and current motorsport commentator. He is a four time IndyCar Series champion (2007, 2009, 2010, 2011), a three-time winner of the Indianapolis 500 (2007, 2010, 2012) as well as a winner of the 24 Hours of Daytona (2008).
